ValidationRule.description: Validation rule deactivated based on business request CR1028
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(Not(Email_1__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_1__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_2__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_2__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_3__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_3__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_4__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_4__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_5__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_5__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_6__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_6__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_7__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_7__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_8__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_8__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_9__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_9__c,'@dell'))), AND(Not(Email_10__c=''), NOT(CONTAINS(Email_10__c,'@dell'))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid Email Address. Email address must be a Dell email address.
